scripts.build: npm run clean && webpack -d && npm run copy && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --inline --hot
scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p && npm run copy
scripts.win:build: npm run win:clean && webpack -d && npm run win:copy && webpack-dev-server --content-base src --inline --hot
scripts.win:build:prod: npm run win:clean && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p && npm run win:copy
